# Contributing

## Support

[Post your question on StackOverflow with the `docpad` tag](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/docpad)


## Bug reports

[Post your bug report on the GitHub Issue Tracker for this project](https://github.com/docpad/docpad-plugin-gist/issues)


## Development

### Install dependencies

``` bash
npm install; npm install -g coffee-script
```

### Setup for development

``` bash
cake setup
```

### Watch and compile

``` bash
cake watch
```


## Testing

No tests yet!
